user_query: I'm planning to start an online store and I need a user-friendly website builder that offers customizable templates and secure payment integration. Can you recommend a suitable website builder tool for my business? Additionally, help me find real-time organic search results for successful online stores to gather inspiration.

TaskList.description: Research and identify user-friendly website builders that offer customizable templates and secure payment integration.
Compile a list of recommended website builders based on the criteria established in Subtask 1.
Search for real-time organic search results for successful online stores to gather inspiration.
Synthesize information from Subtask 2 and Subtask 3 to provide a comprehensive overview for the user.
